ctx: Huawei Ascend P1 in Ascend P1 S
content:
Debelina 7.69mm in 6.68 mm.
4.3" Super AMOLED qHD (540 x 960)
Gorilla Glass
TI OMAP 4460 chipset with a dual-core ARM Cortex A9 1.5 GHz processor, PowerVR SGX540 graphics chip
 Android 4.0  ICS
1 gig of RAM and 4 gigs of storage memory
8 MP sharpshooters with Backside illuminated sensors for better low-light performance, dual-LED flashes, HDR effects and 1080p video capture
1.3 MP front-facing cameras with 720p video capabilities

content: Ja hardwersko je hud, oblikovalsko pa tudi povsem ok. Če bo še cenovno ugoden bo dobra izbira.
